data.title: Death Notice of Monica WRIGHT (nÃ©e Kane) (Malahide, Dublin)
data.meta_description: The death has occurred of Monica WRIGHT (nÃ©e Kane) of Malahide, Dublin Ireland, on 23/08/2020. You can view the full death notice and add your condolences here.
data.text:
WRIGHT (née Kane), Monica (Malahide) - August 23rd, 2020 (peacefully) in the loving care of the staff at St. Francis Hospice, Blanchardstown. Beloved daughter of the late Anne. Sadly missed by her loving husband G.V., daughter Karen , sons David & Conor, son-in-law Jon, grandchildren Olivia & Senan, her father Paddy, brother Declan, sister-in-law Debbie, nephew, niece, relatives and friends.

May She Rest In Peace

Due to government advice regarding public gatherings, a private funeral will take place on Tuesday (August 25th). You can view the funeral Mass live on webcam from 11.00 a.m. Family flowers only please. Donations, if desired to St. Francis Hospice.

Webcam link: http://funeralslive.ie/monica-wright/

Those who wish to attend the funeral but cannot due to current restrictions, please leave your personal message in the 'Condolences' section below.
